players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Alice was killed last night, and I have investigated Bob—I confirm Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob's silence is suspicious, but we should be cautious and not rush. Charlie's claim about investigating Bob could be true, but we need to watch for any inconsistencies before voting."
Charlie: "Bob's silence after my clear claim is very telling. If he is innocent, he should defend himself. I urge Diana to trust my investigation and vote Bob out now."
Diana: "Bob's silence is indeed suspicious, but we must be absolutely sure before we vote him out. Charlie's claim seems strong, so I will trust him this time and vote for Bob."
